name: Hiero
description:
Created for the #gamedevjs Jam 2021. This game uses absolutely NO JavaScript.

Quickly solve 15 brain-teasing puzzles by finding the mismatched and mirrored hieroglyphs. This puzzler features an old-timey cartoon vibe with original hand drawn artwork, combined with an atmospheric original soundtrack and sound effects.

For the best experience, it's recommended you play using Chrome.
